data.prayer: Spirit, help the fearful in Zanzan, Côte d‘Ivoire to submit to God and resist the devil.
data.verse: Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Zanzan, Côte d‘Ivoire
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Zanzan to exponentially multiply disciples.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 10 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, of the 66,275 people in the state of Zanzan who claim Christianity, challenge some of them to pick up your Word and read it for themselves today.
data.verse: Then you will know the truth, and the truth will set you free.

data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 30,084 believers in Zanzan, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Ligbi people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Zanzan. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Zanzan.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Holy Spirit, have mercy on the simple who turned from you in the state of Zanzan. Warn them again against their complacency.
data.verse: For the simple are killed by their turning away, and the complacency of fools destroys them;

location.name: Zanzan
location.people_groups_list: Bondoukou Kulango, Jula, Dyula, Brong, Banda, Nafana, Ngen
